name: Pictionary
description:
Pictionary is a conversion of the famous board game for Nintendo DS. There are three modes:
  • Pictionary Solo: the AI draws sketches and the player has to select the right clue. If correct, they advance on the Pictionary board. After three wrong guesses the game is over.
  • Pass and Play: the gameplay is comparable to the previous mode, but players compete in teams.
  • Pictionary Quizmode: also a single-player mode, where the player has to guess clues as fast as possible, in rows of 10, 20 or 30 correct answers.
